title: Jessica Simpson shares adorable selfie with 'dimple double' Birdie Mae
text:
Jessica Simpson shared a sweet photo with her baby daughter, Birdie Mae, on Wednesday.

The 39-year-old beauty rocked a casual hoodie while posing for a selfie with her look-a-like daughter.

And the Dukes Of Hazzard actress noted how the little girl has inherited her dimples.

Twins: Jessica Simpson shades an adorable selfie with her 'dimple double' mini-me, Birdie Mae, on Wednesday

'My dimple double #BIRDIEMAE,' she captioned.

Jessica was dressed in a leopard print hoodie while holding up her youngest daughter.

The blonde beauty appeared to be makeup free but added lash extensions to complete her look.

Baby makes five: Jessica welomed Birdie in March 2019 with her husband Eric Johnson

Jessica slicked her hair back into a high ponytail for the selfie.

She recently revealed she had dropped 100lbs in just six months after giving birth to her third child.

The ex-wife of Nick Lachey recently revealed that after tipping the scales at 240 pounds in March, she was now down 100lbs.

'6 months. 100 pounds down (Yes, I tipped the scales at 240),' she revealed on Instagram.

'My first trip away from #BIRDIEMAE and emotional for many reasons, but so proud to feel like myself again.'

Hot mama: The ex-wife of Nick Lachey recently revealed that after tipping the scales at 240 pounds in March, she was now down 100 pounds

The girls: Birdie Mae is Jessica's second daughter, following first-born, Maxwell Drew

She continued: 'Even when it felt impossible, I chose to work harder.'

Jessica employed celebrity trainer Harley Pasternak to help transform her diet and working out routing.

She walked 12,000 steps per day and focused on a diet that was high in protein and fiber. He also revealed that despite having a new baby, she also got seven hours of sleep each night.

The beauty is also the mom to eldest daughter Maxwell Drew, seven, and Ace Knute, six, with her former NFL star husband, Eric Johnson.

Jessica wed Eric in 2014, and was previously wed to Nick Lachey of 98 Degrees from 2002 to 2006.
description: Jessica Simpson shades an adorable selfie with her 'dimple double' mini-me, Birdie Mae, on Wednesday. The photo was black and white and featured a smiling and makeup free Jessica.
